channel.title: Want to make a website your Desktop?
channel.description:
If so follow these steps. STEP 1 Open up notepad on your desktop. (desktop>[u]right click[/u]>new>text document) STEP 2 Paste this exactly as its written in the new document: [code]runescape
[/code] Then go to save and name it whatever you want but at the end put ".html" . e.g. ("rs on desktop.html") (If you want it to show a different website other then runescape, then change the "http://www.runescape.com" to whatever you want but [b]dont!![/b] get rid of the quotation marks!) Then [b][i][u][glow=red,2,300]BEFORE YOU SAVE[/glow][/u][/i][/b] go to save as type: and set it to all types then save it. STEP 3 Right click on your desktop and bring up properties. Then go to desktop. Go to browse and find the file you just saved and select it and then select open. STEP 4 Select the name of the file; Click apply and then you're done. IF for some reason the window is too big, you can resize it by editing the document then setting a different wall paper, then set the file over again. To Change Sizing: Open the document in notepad ( right click on the file>open with>notepad), then Change the 1100 and 800 in the document [URL=http://allyoucanupload.webshots.com/v/2002595927312868357][IMG]http://aycu24.webshots.com/image/8423/2002595927312868357_rs.jpg[/img][/URL] Then change them to whatever you like [URL=http://allyoucanupload.webshots.com/v/2002595927312868357][IMG]http://aycu24.webshots.com/image/8423/2002595927312868357_th.jpg[/img][/URL] IF you want to get rid of the rs background: 1.(Easiest way by far (for n00bs from moparisthebest.com)) *Note: close everything before you do it this way. Hold down the power button on your computer until the computer turns off (not just logging off but actually turns off completely) Then turn the computer on and log onto your username. _______________________________________________ 2.(Harder but will work (for Moparisthebest.com members)) Go to start>control panel>appearance and themes>change desktop background and change it from there *note: or you can change it back by going to your desktop rightclicking>properties>desktop and choosing your desktop. P.S. pm me if you got questions [glow=red,2,300]25% credit goes to "Frozen" at [url=http://blizzind.com/viewtopic.php?t=161]http://blizzind.com/viewtopic.php?t=161[/url]and 75% goes to me for the pics and then writing this out[/glow]

item.title: Want to make a website your Desktop?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

lil 0mfgorz:

lol

4. We don’t make posts that contain not useful information. Posts like “cool”, “lol”, “yeah” and “I agree” don’t contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.

Now the reason I point this out to you is because you joined 4 hours ago, you already have 115 posts, and almost al of them have less then 5 words.

Read full topic
